pagename: Money making guide/Killing brutal black dragons
title: Killing brutal black dragons

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 50 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck. At maximum efficiency, it is possible to obtain 70-75 kills per hour.

content:
Killing brutal black dragons
Requirements
Skills
  • 77
  • 37+ (Protect from Magic)
  • 45 (Chapel with at least Oak altar)
  • 85+ recommended
Items
  • Dragon hunter crossbow with a twisted buckler, dragonfire ward, odium ward or book of law, or twisted bow
  • Diamond bolts (e), or amethyst arrows if using twisted bow
  • Elite Void Knight equipment, or black dragonhide or Armadyl armour if using twisted bow
  • Xeric's talisman
  • Teleport to House or rings of dueling
  • Extended antifires
  • Divine ranging potions
  • Prayer potions (depending on Prayer level)
  • Soul bearer (recommended)
    • Quest
    None
    Other
    None
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    1,193,879 69,300 23,100 17,325
    Inputs (173,161)Outputs (1,367,040)
    230 × Diamond bolts (e) (70,380)8 × Lizardman fang (160)8 × Teleport to house (tablet) (3,808)5 × Extended antifire(1) (260)6 × Divine ranging potion(2) (8,418)9 × Prayer potion(4) (90,135)50 × Dragon bones (108,150)100 × Black dragonhide (356,700)0.098 × Dragon platelegs (15,756)0.098 × Dragon plateskirt (15,757)0.098 × Dragon spear (3,695)3.91 × Rune hasta (46,594)2.73 × Rune platelegs (103,362)4.69 × Rune full helm (96,558)1.95 × Rune longsword (36,479)0.78 × Black d'hide body (5,745)0.39 × Black d'hide vambraces (903)0.39 × Rune platebody (15,032)0.39 × Dragon med helm (23,091)0.39 × Dragon longsword (23,176)0.39 × Dragon dagger (6,792)156 × Rune javelin (26,563)156 × Blood rune (48,750)156 × Soul rune (23,906)205 × Death rune (38,555)205 × Law rune (26,660)205 × Rune arrow (10,254)39.06 × Rune dart (13,672)19.53 × Rune knife (7,422)23.44 × Rune thrownaxe (4,828)6.25 × Anglerfish (12,344)15.63 × Lava scale (20,250)46.88 × Dragon dart tip (131,625)31.25 × Dragon javelin heads (31,094) Only after completion of Monkey Madness II31.25 × Dragon arrowtips (59,125)2.34 × Runite ore (25,931)1,877 × Coins (1,877)0.78 × Rare drop table (6,238)1.17 × Gem drop table (552)0.005 × Draconic visage (19,605)

    The profit rate assumes 50 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck. At maximum efficiency, it is possible to obtain 70-75 kills per hour.

    Brutal black dragons may be found in the Catacombs of Kourend. The average value of one kill is 27,340.8 coins. It is recommended to bring 1-2 Prayer potions (depending on Prayer level), a divine ranging potion and an extended antifire. Protect from Magic should always be activated, or death is certain due to their extremely powerful magical attacks as well as dragonfire. Together, Protect from Magic and Antifire nullify all damage from a distance, but players need to make sure that both are on simultaneously. Melee damage is still highly damaging, so players should be careful if picking up loot while next to an attacking dragon.

    Players should always restore prayer at Player-owned house or at Ferox Enclave and teleport back using Xeric's talisman.

    Kills per hour estimates, estimated drops (not profit), and methodology

    • 40+ kills/hr (1,093,631 gp) with 90+ , blessed dragonhide armour, dragon crossbow, amulet of fury and eagle eye.
    • 50+ kills/hr (1,367,039 gp) with 90+ , blessed dragonhide armour, dragon hunter crossbow, necklace of anguish and eagle eye.
    • 55+ kills/hr (1,503,743 gp) with max , elite void knight equipment, dragon hunter crossbow, necklace of anguish and rigour.
    • 65+ kills/hr (1,777,151 gp) with max , armadyl armour/elite void knight equipment, twisted bow, necklace of anguish and rigour.
    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.

|Details = '''The profit rate assumes {{#var:kph}} kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.''' At maximum efficiency, it is possible to obtain 70-75 kills per hour.

[[Brutal black dragon]]s may be found in the [[Catacombs of Kourend]]. The average value of one kill is {{NoCoins|{{#vardefineecho:oneBBDLoot|{{#expr:
  {{GEP|Dragon bones|1}}*(1) +
  {{GEP|Black dragonhide|2}}*(1) +
  {{GEP|Dragon platelegs|1}}*(1/512) +
  {{GEP|Dragon plateskirt|1}}*(1/512) +
  {{GEP|Dragon spear|1}}*(1/512) +
  {{GEP|Rune hasta|1}}*(10/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune platelegs|1}}*(7/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune full helm|2}}*(6/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune longsword|1}}*(5/128) +
  {{GEP|Black d'hide body|1}}*(2/128) +
  {{GEP|Black d'hide vambraces|1}}*(1/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune platebody|1}}*(1/128) +
  {{GEP|Dragon med helm|1}}*(1/128) +
  {{GEP|Dragon longsword|1}}*(1/128) +
  {{GEP|Dragon dagger|1}}*(1/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune javelin|50}}*(8/128) +
  {{GEP|Blood rune|50}}*(8/128) +
  {{GEP|Soul rune|50}}*(8/128) +
  {{GEP|Death rune|75}}*(7/128) +
  {{GEP|Law rune|75}}*(7/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune arrow|75}}*(7/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune dart|20}}*(5/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune knife|25}}*(2/128) +
  {{GEP|Rune thrownaxe|30}}*(2/128) +
  {{GEP|Anglerfish|2}}*(8/128) +
  {{GEP|Lava scale|5}}*(8/128) +
  {{GEP|Dragon dart tip|40}}*(3/128) +
  {{GEP|Dragon javelin heads|40}}*(2/128) +
  {{GEP|Dragon arrowtips|40}}*(2/128) +
  {{GEP|Runite ore|3}}*(2/128) +
  370*(11/128) +
  734.5*(1/128) +
  {{RDTValue}}*(2/128) +
  {{GDTValue}}*(3/128) +
  {{GEP|Draconic visage|1}}*(1/10000)
}}}}}} coins. It is recommended to bring 1-2 [[Prayer potion]]s (depending on [[Prayer]] level), a [[divine ranging potion]] and an [[extended antifire]]. [[Protect from Magic]] should always be activated, or death is certain due to their extremely powerful magical attacks as well as [[dragonfire]]. Together, Protect from Magic and Antifire nullify all damage from a distance, but players need to make sure that both are on simultaneously. Melee damage is still highly damaging, so players should be careful if picking up loot while next to an attacking dragon.

Players should always restore prayer at [[Player-owned house]] or at [[Ferox Enclave]] and teleport back using [[Xeric's talisman]].

==== Kills per hour estimates, estimated drops (not profit), and methodology ====
* 40+ kills/hr ({{NoCoins|floor{{#expr: 40*{{#var:oneBBDLoot}} }} }} gp) with 90+ {{SCP|Ranged}}, [[blessed dragonhide armour]], [[dragon crossbow]], [[amulet of fury]] and [[eagle eye]].
* 50+ kills/hr ({{NoCoins|floor{{#expr: 50*{{#var:oneBBDLoot}} }} }} gp) with 90+ {{SCP|Ranged}}, [[blessed dragonhide armour]], [[dragon hunter crossbow]], [[necklace of anguish]] and [[eagle eye]].
* 55+ kills/hr ({{NoCoins|floor{{#expr: 55*{{#var:oneBBDLoot}} }} }} gp) with max {{SCP|Ranged}}, [[Elite_Void_Knight_equipment|elite void knight equipment]], [[dragon hunter crossbow]], [[necklace of anguish]] and [[rigour]].
* 65+ kills/hr ({{NoCoins|floor{{#expr: 65*{{#var:oneBBDLoot}} }} }} gp) with max {{SCP|Ranged}}, [[armadyl armour]]/[[Elite_Void_Knight_equipment|elite void knight equipment]], [[twisted bow]], [[necklace of anguish]] and [[rigour]].
